    Constructor Description
    Prometheus()

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createPossibleConstructorPos​(Model model)
    The method creates all the possible ConstructorPosition, then check if there are some of these that can't be chosen if the player want to use his god power.
    void createPossibleMovePos​(Model model, java.util.List<Position> wrongList)
    Creates a standard PossibleMovePos list, then delete every position in the wrongList from the main list, then set the list as the TileToShow and end with sending a notify with code: "standard"

    • getWrongPos

      public java.util.List<Position> getWrongPos​(Model model)
      Method used to get all the Positions that will need to be eliminated from the normal moveset (only if due to his own power Prometheus can't go up)
      Parameters:
      model - the Model of the game
      Returns:
      the list of wrong Position to eliminate (or null if there aren't any)

    • sameOrDownLevel

      public java.util.List<Position> sameOrDownLevel​(Model model, Constructor c)
      Given a Constructor the method returns the list of tile's Positions which are at the same level (or below) of the tile where is the Constructor
      Parameters:
      model - the Model of the game
      c - the Constructor to check
      Returns:
      the list (even with 0 elements) of Positions

    • sameOrDownLevelCurrent

      public java.util.List<Position> sameOrDownLevelCurrent​(Model model)
      Modified version of the standard sameOrDownLevel using the currentConstructor
      Parameters:
      model - the Model of the game
      Returns:
      a list of Positions

    • createPossibleConstructorPos

      public void createPossibleConstructorPos​(Model model)
      The method creates all the possible ConstructorPosition, then check if there are some of these that can't be chosen if the player want to use his god power. If at the end there are no noPowerPos (= no Power Positions) the method forces a notify using a TileToShowMessage with a standard code, otherwise forces a notify using a SpecialActionMessage with the code "noPower"
      Parameters:
      model - the Model of the game

    • createPossibleMovePos

      public void createPossibleMovePos​(Model model, java.util.List<Position> wrongList)
      Creates a standard PossibleMovePos list, then delete every position in the wrongList from the main list, then set the list as the TileToShow and end with sending a notify with code: "standard"
      Parameters:
      model - the Model of the list
      wrongList - the list of wrong Positions

    • setCorrectPhase

      public void setCorrectPhase​(Model model)
